title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-India's Shopper's Stop Posts Sept Quarter Consol Loss (Oct 23)
text:
CORRECTED-BRIEF-India's Shopper's Stop Posts Sept Quarter Consol Loss (Oct 23)

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 11:36)

© Reuters. CORRECTED-BRIEF-India's Shopper's Stop Posts Sept Quarter Consol Loss (Oct 23) (In Oct 23 Brief, corrects figures in second bullet) Oct 24 (Reuters) - Shopper's Stop Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL LOSS 81.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 118.5 MILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 8.66 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 8.90 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR

CORRECTED-BRIEF-India's Shopper's Stop Posts Sept Quarter Consol Loss (Oct 23)
